ingredients: 1 pound beef round steak or flank steak, sliced lengthwise into 2½ inch wide pieces and then crosswise (against the grain) into ⅛ inch thick slices. Try freezing the beef for an hour or two to firm it up for easier slicing.
2 tablespoons rice wine or dry sherry
1 teaspoon Chinese or Japanese sesame oil
8 cups bite-sized broccoli florets (but from 2 crowns - reserve stems for another use)
4 tablespoons peanut oil or canola oil, divided
4 Teaspoons Chinese Rice Wine or dry sherry
1 small onion, peeled, halved and thinly sliced
2 large cloves of garlic, minced (about 1 tablespoon)
½ teaspoon crushed red pepper flakes
